One Level Up Top Level

nodes/Makefile - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. #
  3. # Makefile--
  4. #    Makefile for backend/nodes
  5. #
  6. # IDENTIFICATION
  7. #    src/backend/nodes/Makefile
  8. #
  9. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  11. subdir = src/backend/nodes
  12. top_builddir = ../../..
  13. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  15. override CPPFLAGS := -I. -I$(srcdir) $(CPPFLAGS)

  17. OBJS = \
  18.     bitmapset.o \
  19.     copyfuncs.o \
  20.     equalfuncs.o \
  21.     extensible.o \
  22.     list.o \
  23.     makefuncs.o \
  24.     multibitmapset.o \
  25.     nodeFuncs.o \
  26.     outfuncs.o \
  27.     params.o \
  28.     print.o \
  29.     queryjumblefuncs.o \
  30.     read.o \
  31.     readfuncs.o \
  32.     tidbitmap.o \
  33.     value.o

  35. include $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/common.mk

  37. # The principal node-defining headers are listed in their inclusion order,
  38. # to ensure cross-file subtyping works correctly.  The rest can just be
  39. # listed alphabetically.
  40. # Caution: re-ordering this list risks ABI breakage!
  41. node_headers = \
  42.     nodes/nodes.h \
  43.     nodes/primnodes.h \
  44.     nodes/parsenodes.h \
  45.     nodes/pathnodes.h \
  46.     nodes/plannodes.h \
  47.     nodes/execnodes.h \
  48.     access/amapi.h \
  49.     access/sdir.h \
  50.     access/tableam.h \
  51.     access/tsmapi.h \
  52.     commands/event_trigger.h \
  53.     commands/trigger.h \
  54.     executor/tuptable.h \
  55.     foreign/fdwapi.h \
  56.     nodes/bitmapset.h \
  57.     nodes/extensible.h \
  58.     nodes/lockoptions.h \
  59.     nodes/miscnodes.h \
  60.     nodes/replnodes.h \
  61.     nodes/supportnodes.h \
  62.     nodes/value.h \
  63.     utils/rel.h

  65. # see also catalog/Makefile for an explanation of these make rules

  67. all: generated-header-symlinks

  69. .PHONY: generated-header-symlinks

  71. generated-header-symlinks: $(top_builddir)/src/include/nodes/header-stamp

  73. # node-support-stamp records the last time we ran gen_node_support.pl.
  74. # We don't rely on the timestamps of the individual output files,
  75. # because the Perl script won't update them if they didn't change (to
  76. # avoid unnecessary recompiles).
  77. node-support-stamp: gen_node_support.pl $(addprefix $(top_srcdir)/src/include/,$(node_headers))
  78.     $(PERL) $^
  79.     touch $@

  81. # These generated headers must be symlinked into src/include/.
  82. # We use header-stamp to record that we've done this because the symlinks
  83. # themselves may appear older than node-support-stamp.
  84. $(top_builddir)/src/include/nodes/header-stamp: node-support-stamp
  85.     cd '$(dir $@)' && for file in nodetags.h; do \
  86.       rm -f $$file && $(LN_S) "../../../$(subdir)/$$file" . ; \
  87.     done
  88.     touch $@

  90. copyfuncs.o: copyfuncs.c copyfuncs.funcs.c copyfuncs.switch.c | node-support-stamp
  91. equalfuncs.o: equalfuncs.c equalfuncs.funcs.c equalfuncs.switch.c | node-support-stamp
  92. outfuncs.o: outfuncs.c outfuncs.funcs.c outfuncs.switch.c | node-support-stamp
  93. queryjumblefuncs.o: queryjumblefuncs.c queryjumblefuncs.funcs.c queryjumblefuncs.switch.c | node-support-stamp
  94. readfuncs.o:  readfuncs.c readfuncs.funcs.c readfuncs.switch.c | node-support-stamp

  96. clean:
  97.     rm -f node-support-stamp $(addsuffix funcs.funcs.c,copy equal out queryjumble read) $(addsuffix funcs.switch.c,copy equal out queryjumble read) nodetags.h

One Level Up Top Level
